messageBody:
At 04:09 PM 21-02-01 -0800, Ryan Ankarberg wrote:
>I was noticing that each time a particular test method within my test cases
>is called, it in turn calls setup(), each time... How can I go about having
>it only call setup() once, when the test case is initialized?

From the FAQ :

How do I run setup code once for all my TestCases?
Wrap the top level suite in a subclass of TestSetup. Here is a sample
AllTests.suite() method:
public static Test suite() {
TestSuite suite= new TestSuite();
...add your tests and suites here...
TestSetup wrapper= new TestSetup(suite) {
public void setUp() {
oneTimeSetUp();
}
};
return wrapper;
}

Robert
